duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through business to business sales, with a focus on critical business discussions and solving business owners' problems.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes and maintain client relationships.
Engage in face-to-face interactions, networking, and portfolio building to acquire new clients and drive revenue growth.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to facilitate client acquisition and simplify the sales process.
Be a compelling and persistent communicator, bringing concepts to life and maintaining a top position on the sales leaderboard.
Undergo training in all things publishing and receive comprehensive support to achieve high-performance sales.
Take control of the future, run with the big dogs, and level up with a team focused on success.
Apply now and demonstrate high-performance qualities to obtain a limited territory.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
